channel.title: Changing the Color of Mopar
channel.description:
For the ladies:
http://i41.tinypic.com/2zxrpyu.png
A Possible Choice:
http://i41.tinypic.com/2mesa54.png
My personal favorite. CBA to texture the whole thing but you should get the gist:
http://i43.tinypic.com/13zol5g.png
(pics too big, I didn't want to make it cover the entire thread lol)

item.title: Changing the Color of Mopar
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:33, topic:534785”][quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=653585.msg4380566#msg4380566 date=1383389787]
These are also nice:
http://demo.dzinerstudio.com/smf2/index.php?theme=44
http://demo.dzinerstudio.com/smf2/index.php?theme=45
http://demo.dzinerstudio.com/smf2/index.php?theme=48
[/quote]

The problem you will find is that they are too skinny, when people make posts and have pictures of their clients it will cut the sides off, and you will have to scroll right and left.[/quote]

True but there is a mod to stop that happening and to make the txt box bigger

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the Color of Mopar
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:49, topic:534785”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=653585.msg4401322#msg4401322 date=1390721298]
Since we’re now operating from a single site these issues should be all but gone, theme and modification installation shouldn’t be a problem. Find a theme, if the community like it, it’s installed. Easy as can be.
[/quote]

[quote author=Spades link=topic=653585.msg4380298#msg4380298 date=1383293731]
Here is my suggested theme(s):
http://custom.simplemachines.org/themes/index.php?lemma=2717

Just add the Mopar logo to the top, and call it a day. People can decide for their own theme.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=theme
[/quote][/quote]
We don’t have any social media sites so that would need some simple modification before use, from what I remember mitb isn’t keen on social media etc.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Please no DzinerStudio if we’re going to have a different theme. They’re overrated and, quite frankly, in my opinion, look ugly. If we were to have a different theme, I would prefer to have a custom one. CSS isn’t hard to use, yaknow. Just making it capable with the Mopar forums may be the difficult part.

item.title: Changing the Color of Mopar
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

sinisoul:

Dark themes are bad. Believe it or not they cause a feeling of depression.

I’m well aware of the moods of colors but I’m rather worried about my eyes than my depression, I can keep that atoned - and before someone says I can turn down the brightness, people can also change their theme color back to the default while others use the darker one, not a big deal IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the Color of Mopar
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:26, topic:534785”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=653585.msg4380062#msg4380062 date=1383222366]

Dark themes are bad. Believe it or not they cause a feeling of depression.
[/quote]I don’t see why it would matter if it is an optional theme. If you don’t like it, use something else.

[hr]

I was thinking about this last night before bed for some odd reason. I had an idea kind of pop up in my head. And well first off keep in mind that I am no developer so I have no idea how this would work/if even possible.

Why can’t we like design our own theme according to our profile? Couldn’t it be via cookies so it doesn’t have to store so much information into the server? You know how on vbulletin how you can change the colors of the profile page etc for that specific user? Make it like that but for the entire board. Maybe even an option to add custom themes or edit the html somehow. Would be a cool thing to see. That way people can’t say one is better than the other.

One issue, who’s making it?[/quote]community suggestions

I nominate you!

But no seriously it was just an idea. I don’t have any web development friends besides maybe Ruby and I know he’s like super busy. It would be awesome though if one of the talented web people on here took up this project.

Read full topic
